Text: FW Louise Kitchen meeting rescheduled againMy meeting with Louise has now been rerescheduled for Friday at Do you want to Do a quick lunch tomorrow Do a quick lunch tomorrow and schedule another time for a swanky lunch Reschedule Whats up with this lunch do we need planetary alignment to make it happen Original Message From Villarreal Lillian Sent Monday October PM To Hotte Steve Subject Louise Kitchen meeting rescheduled again Steve FYI Kim Hillis called to reschedule your meeting with Louise Kitchen from Tuesday am to Thursday am Thanks LV

FW Quarter Forecast Meeting with Stan CanceledWhen your busy calendar permits Original Message From Houser Rita Sent Monday August AM To Hotte Steve Subject RE Quarter Forecast Meeting with Stan Canceled Not yet she was going to call me with some dates Rita Original Message From Hotte Steve Sent Monday August AM To Houser Rita Subject FW Quarter Forecast Meeting with Stan Canceled Do I have a new lunch datetime with Tracy Original Message From Geaccone Tracy Sent Sunday August PM To Cordes Bill McCarty Danny Harris Steven Hayes Robert Neubauer Dave Hotte Steve Corman Shelley Lowry Phil Smith Gary Fossum Drew Cc Gilbert Steve Barnes Caroline Keiser John Hayslett Rod Carpenter Nancy Concklin Elaine Brassfield Morris Perchal Cheryl Peters Jerry Saunders James Guthrie Robert Rice Greek Weitekamp James Stark Cindy Sellers Emily Alder Amelia Armstrong Julie Robertson Audrey Winters Ricki Subject Quarter Forecast Meeting with Stan Canceled The third quarter forecast meeting scheduled with Stan on Wednesday August at has been canceled Rod and I will meet with Stan separately Thanks Tracy

ANSIXQOpenSeasonforexpansionoftheKel ANSIXQsoBeaverPipelinetheFKBPipelineF Cc I received a call from Portland General Electric PGE asking for assistance in posting an open season for them in regards to their KelsoBeaver Pipeline The reason they are asking for assistance is that they currently do not have an electronic bulletin board I have attached a draft version of their open season The plan would be to utilize the Hot Tap platform for their posting Please advise if you have any comments regarding this issue Thank you

The New Power Company Agreement Cc overviews an agreement for ETS to provide Desktop Services ApplicationDatabase monitoring and Windows conversion for The New Power Company If approved by The New Power Company this agreement will generate approximately in revenue with a profit margin for ETS This will also open the door for a number of higher dollar service offerings including Optical Imaging and Disaster Recovery Bob Martinez and Kelly Strader are our IT point people for this transaction We should know by year end if our proposal is accepted

eCommerceeBusiness Strategy Cc attached the ETS eCommerceeBusiness strategy document As there are many definitions associated with eCommerceeBusiness pages one to four of the document provide us a common definition and understanding to be used within ETS Page five overviews the statistics of the eCommerceeBusiness transactions we have completed in ETS this year Included in the figures are close to three million eConfirmations and five million hits to our eInformational postings Pages six to thirteen overview future ETS eCommerceeBusiness opportunities with page nine listing specific goals for This document was created with the collaboration of many departments The rapid pace of technology and the use of that technology in business practices will force continued input into this evergreen document Please let me know if you have any questions or require further clarification on any items contained in the attachment Thank you attachment

ETS IT Scorecard Cc attached the ETS IT Goals and Objectives Through year end we will continue to review the goalsobjectives from the other ETS depatments to insure the IT goals are properly aligned to assist in the successful completion of all appropriate ETS activities

FW Outstanding Invoice from Aribajust as an fyi Every time I think were bringing closure to IT expenses related to Azurix another item to discussdebate turns up Original Message From Davila Raul Sent Wednesday October PM To Abshire Scott Cc Wasek Cheryl Sullivan Michael Steward Larry Hotte Steve Flores Leticia Gillespie John Subject FW Outstanding Invoice from Ariba Scottthe information on the Ariba invoice follows We dont physically have the invoice here but the vendor is inquiring on payment OM dated due The invoice was sent to Randy Dutton WaterDesk Corp Clay Street Suite Houston TX The contact at Ariba is Lisa Kahn Ariba Inc Credit Analyst Thanks Original Message From Hotte Steve Sent Wednesday October PM To Davila Raul Cc Abshire Scott Wasek Cheryl Sullivan Michael Steward Larry Subject RE Outstanding Invoice from Ariba Please forward to Scott for review How much is the invoice for and when was it dated Original Message From Davila Raul Sent Wednesday October PM To Hotte Steve Subject FW Outstanding Invoice from Ariba Steve Ariba has invoices still open related to the Waterdesk Marketplace Do you know if there are any points of contact that can address Aribas invoices Thanks Original Message From Gillespie John Sent Wednesday October AM To Davila Raul Cc Flores Leticia Subject RE Outstanding Invoice from Ariba Raul I believe all the WaterDesk folks are gone I would suggest getting in touch with someone within EGS group I recall the WaterDesk folks believing they would not pay Ariba for this as their marketplace has shut down I dont know if contractually they have this right Maybe Mike Sullivan can help Sorry John Original Message From Davila Raul Sent Wednesday October AM To Gillespie John Cc Flores Leticia Subject FW Outstanding Invoice from Ariba John Do you know who took over the Waterdesk stuff for Azurix Ariba is calling to get their invoices paid The invoice is not in iPayit but Ariba doesnt know who to contact on it Any ideas Original Message From Flores Leticia Sent Wednesday October AM To Davila Raul Subject FW Outstanding Invoice from Ariba Raul Need your help on this I have no idea if we indeed are working with Azurix invoices Maybe you know of a contact that we can ask or forward this issue to Let me know Letty Original Message From Elrod Hal Sent Wednesday October AM To Flores Leticia Subject RE Outstanding Invoice from Ariba Thanks I have no idea who at Azurix would be resonsible for this Original Message From Lisa Kahn mailto Sent Monday October PM To Elrod Hal Subject Outstanding Invoice from Ariba Importance High Hal Your name was provided to me from our records I am looking for payment status on an outstanding invoice which is for WaterDesk Corporation Enron purchased WaterDesk in December The invoice is for nd year license of Dynamic Trade software The invoice information is OM dated due The invoice was sent to Randy Dutton WaterDesk Corp Clay Street Suite Houston TX If you are not the correct person to contact please provide me with a contact name phone email address I look forward to your response Thank you Lisa Kahn Ariba Inc Credit Analyst

FW Memo for JasonAs stated in the note the JV will pick up these expenses Our impact is the percentage ownership we have in the JV Do you see any issue with proceeding Original Message From Rub Jenny Sent Monday November AM To Hotte Steve Subject FW Memo for Jason Original Message From McAuliffe Bob Sent Monday November AM To Rub Jenny Subject RE Memo for Jason Approving this unless I hear differently from you Bob Original Message From Smith Bruce Sent Monday November AM To McAuliffe Bob Subject FW Memo for Jason Importance High See Jasons note below and let me know if you need more info Original Message From Chumley Jason Sent Monday November AM To Smith Bruce Subject FW Memo for Jason Importance High Bruce David Walton CFO of the Accroven Joint Venture in Venezuela is asking for Jonathan to come down and finish some work that has been in progress for a while now They have already spent quite a bit of money on hardware and need to get everything setup There is a lot of work that needs to be done and was scheduled for last week I had Jonathan cancel this trip due to the travel freeze Both the airfare and Jonathans Hotel will be direct billed to the JV The remainder of Jonathans expenses should be under Can you please get this travel approved Thanks Jason Original Message From Walton David Sent Friday November PM To Chumley Jason Subject Memo for Jason Importance High Jason As you are aware we have been working for a while with Jonathan Perret on a project for installing new Exchange servers in all our plants Jose San Joaqun and Santa Brbara At the same time we decided to install a Web Sense server in Caracas in order for us to manage the Internet access connection and an Intranet Web Server in Puerto La Cruz for Accroven Home Page We have also modified and stabilized all our links so to improve the bandwidth used for our applications and for soon to be Voice over IP for the communication with all ours plants All the hardware necessary to perform these actions were purchased and received by Accroven all the software purchased and received by Enron to be backcharge to Accroven Now to complete this project the following tasks must be perform with Jonathan assistance Build SACARAPWS Web Sense server in Caracas Build SASJMSMBXP Exchange server for San Joaqun Build SAJOSMSMBXP Exchange server for Jose Build SASBMSMBXP Exchange server for Santa Brbara Migrate Jose users from SAPLCMSMBXP to SAJOSMSMBXP Build SAPLCWWGENP Intranet Web server for Puerto La Cruz The estimation time to conclude these tasks is week and we understand that you will charge us all the cost for this assistance and reimbursable expenses I would appreciate your approval for Jonathan to to travel Best regards David

Re LAWRENCE CLAYTON JR Cc IT perspective Lawrence has a general overview of technology With Aquila he was involved in the development of the companys integrated risk credit and cash management systems Although I would not consider him to have a depth of technology experience he does have a sound understanding of how IT and the business need to function together Lawrence presented himself professionally and has good interpersonal skills It seems you provided him with a detailed picture of the challenges he would face at EOTT but that did not deter his desire for the opportunity I believe he could be successful if given the position with EOTT Stanley Horton AM Sent by Cindy Stark To Rick CT Ben F CT Rod NRON Richard NRON Steve NRON David PortMarket NRON cc Mary Ellen ott Dana ott Subject LAWRENCE CLAYTON JR Thank you for agreeing to interview with Mr Lawrence Clayton Jr Lawrence is being considered for the position of Chief Financial Officer for EOTT Energy Partners This position would have responsibility for the accounting finance credit treasury risk management and IT functions within the EOTT organization This is an extremely important position within the EOTT organization and we want to be sure that the person we hire is the right person for the job This is why weve asked for your time It would be appreciated if you would followup with an email to me giving me your thoughts on Lawrence Specifically answers to the following questions would be helpful Does the candidate possess the required technical skills to be successful in this job Does the candidate possess the necessary leadership and teamwork skills and behaviors Does the candidate possess the necessary communication skills internal external Does the candidate seem in alignment with Enrons values In your opinion do you believe the candidate would be successful in this job Any other feedback would be most appreciated Thanks Stan

Per our discussion after your staff meeting todayAs related to ETS IT we would receive in summary Enron Net Works ISC in support of SAP The remainder of the note details the above summarized charges The allocation we would receive from Enron Net Works for ETS is It is made up of three primary categories IT Infrastructure email internet support security EDI data center operations enterprise software licenses Data Communications Support local area networks LAN wide area networks WAN Voice Communications Support telephony Three relevant areas of the which are still being discussed are depreciation charge of allocation for an enterprise portal for we believe this project has been posponed indefinantly allocation for EnronOnline services of we have had discussions regarding the allocation methodology which should put this allocation closer to I have attached a spreadsheet that details the costs on an even more granular level If you would like me to complete a similar overview for EGS please let me know Thank you

RE ETS IT November Newsletter Now AvailableWe created the framework for the newsletter within ETS Now it only takes limited time from a staff level individual to put it together There were and are no corporate resources used in its creation or publication We were looking to keep business as usual especially as relating to communication but given our extraordinary circumstances will stop publication if you think it more appropriate Please advise Thank you Original Message From Horton Stanley Sent Monday November PM To Hotte Steve Subject FW ETS IT November Newsletter Now Available Given our limited corporate resources can we cut the IT newsletter Original Message From Villarreal Lillian Sent Monday November AM To DLETS IT Everyone DLETS Newsletter Distribution Subject ETS IT November Newsletter Now Available Please visit the latest issue of the ETS IT newsletter at ITNewsletterdefaultasp Thanks

StaffingMany of the costs associated with Enron Net Works are allocated to the business units based on persondesk top Enron Net Works will be reducing their head count as a result of certain business units reducing people They have asked if ETSEGS will be reducing head count so that they can make the appropriate modifications to the Enron Net Works staff Please let me know if there is any insight you can share with me regarding this topic Thank you

Thank youStan I wanted to thank you again for your guidance through my recent organizational changes I want you to know that I am in firm support of wherever you carry the flag no matter what it may say on that flag If you need me and my team to take a hill well make it happen Others in the group appreciated my staying as presented in the following notes but I would not have been in the position to make this decision without your support You and the family have a well deserved Happy Thanksgiving Appreciatively Steve Original Message From Cernoch Sandra Sent Thursday November AM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status Steve I am glad you are staying with our group I feel very confident with your leadership Thanks Sandra Cernoch Original Message From Bisbee Joanne Sent Thursday November AM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status Steve I am glad to know that you will be with us through this tough time Thanks for all that you do Joanne Original Message From Sawyer Lisa Sent Thursday November AM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status Welcome back We need you Original Message From Gigliotti Mark Sent Thursday November AM To Hotte Steve Subject Re My Status I am very glad you are staying Original Message From Steward Larry Sent Thursday November PM To Hotte Steve Subject Re My Status Its great news having you stay Larry Original Message From Abshire Scott Sent Thursday November PM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status SWEET Original Message From Thomas Sylvia Sent Thursday November PM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status Steve I hope you are not disappointed because I am sure I speak for the majority in saying we did not want you to leave us Thanks for staying Original Message From Stacy Don Sent Thursday November PM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status Glad to hear this Good move Don Original Message From McGregor Donna Sent Thursday November AM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status Steve This is a good thing in my opinion Original Message From Sumpter James Sent Thursday November AM To Hotte Steve Subject RE My Status Steve Although you were probably looking forward to the excitement of the new opportunity Im glad that youre staying with us My team looks forward to helping you succeed in bringing the pipeline groups to new technological heights James

EOL Outage Saturday January th Cc Michelle Lokay TW to the EOL distributions Thank you Forwarded by Steve HotteCorpEnron on AM From Bob nronXgate on PM To Jack NRON Theresa BranneyET nron Craig BuehlerET NRON Rachel NRON Rick DietzET NRON Sharon NRON Morgan GottsponerET NRON Steve NRON Laura LantefieldET NRON Jean nronxgate Vernon MercaldoET NRON Sue NevilleET NRON Jeff NielsenET nron Eileen PeeblesET NRON Julia WhiteET NRON Jo WilliamsET NRON cc Subject EOL Outage Saturday January th There will be an EOL Outage on Saturday January th from am until am central time They will be doing Network maintenance during that time frame Jean McFarland will be the point of contact if you have any problems with this outage Jean can be reached via pager Thanks Bob Martinez

Trading System Cc Transportation Services ETS is looking to expand the use of structured products both from a physical and financial perspective To support these initiatives ETS needs a tradingrisk management system The attached Statement of Work overviews our current and proposed business environments We have looked at the possibility of utilizing an internal Enron tradingrisk management system but to date have not been able to find a feasible alternative Portability security and functionality have been the major hurdles After further discussions it was suggested a communication be sent to each of you to see if you could shed further light on this subject with the potential of using a preexisting Enron system If we are unable to find an internal system we will look to purchase the Caminus package As a tradingrisk management system is seen as a critical step in meeting future revenue targets we will be making a final decision on a tradingrisk management system for ETS in the next two weeks If you have any comments of suggestions please forward them to Lee Ferrell x Thank you
Updated Sally Beck Steve HotteTransition Discussionpst Assistant Christina Valdez x

NNG Transition Meeting Cc On Friday January from am till pm we will be meeting in room C of the Smith Street Enron Building This is the first of several meetings between the Dynegy and Enron Information Technology IT departments The purpose of the January th meeting is to discuss the IT services to be provided by Enron and its affiliates to DynegyNNG under the transition agreement The term of the transition agreement is from February through June This meeting will give us the necessary details to begin activities beginning the first of February subsequent meetings will prepare us for June activities A document has been prepared incorporating the following information for discussion ETS Pipeline Map ETS Business Process Flow ETS Core Application Environment ETS Systems Diagrams ETS Server Summary ETS Business Continuity Plan Summary Ardmore Data Center Layout ETS IT Organization Chart Appendix ETS Reliability Monthly Report template ETS Application Volumes Application Inventory ETS Server Inventory ETS Server Inventory Software List Other items for this discussion will include software licensing interfaces ie from NNG to Dynegy for financial consolidation security and system access especially as related to those Enron employees who will become Dynegy employees on February When our Dynegy guests arrive please ask the security desk to call Lillian Villarreal to escort you to the meeting room Thank you

FW Revised Settlement Documentspst As per my previous note the methodologies may change but keeping you posted as to the current direction Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Wednesday December PM To Barnes Caroline Brassfield Morris Cherry Paul Geaccone Tracy Gilbert Steve Hotte Steve Howard Kevin A Keiser John Peters Jerry Ratner Michael Saunders James Stern Ellis Subject FW Revised Settlement Documents Importance High Confidential but comments are desired to me Very short fuse however Original Message From Fossum Drew Sent Wednesday December AM To Hayslett Rod Subject FW Revised Settlement Documents Here they are DF Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday December AM To Fossum Drew Subject Revised Settlement Documents Attached are the revised settlement documents we sent to BakerBotts on Christmas Eve We of course have not yet heard back Was Rod Haysletts concern just going to the Closing Date concern you raised which we will try to address perhaps by requiring X days notice of a scheduled closing Forwarded by Richard LevineNYWGMUS on AM Richard Levine PM To cc Greg GM Richard GM Martin GM Subject Revised Settlement Documents While we are sure cleanup is needed such as converting the defined term Mutual Release to a new defined term MCTJ Settlement Agreement throughout the documents and we suggest defining Dynegy Inc and Dynegy Holdings as Dynegy for simplification purposes the attached are designed to address your major concerns including that CGNN not be a party in the Adversary Proceeding with protections designed to prevent Dynegy from using that change to attempt to preclude Enron from suing for damages for wrongful exercise under the Option Agreement which we understand to be part of the agreement reached last week We look forward to your comments Merry Christmas Settlement Agreement fka Mutual release See attached file nDOC Settlement Agreement fka Mutual release See attached file nREDDOC Agreed judgment See attached file nDOC Agreed judgment See attached file nREDDOC Agreement See attached file nDOC Agreement See attached file nREDDOC Stipulation See attached file nDOC Stipulation See attached file nREDDOC NOTE The information contained in this email message is intended only for use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient or the employee or agent responsible to deliver it to the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please immediately notify us by telephone and destroy the original message Thank you

FW Services Agmt et alpst Methodologies may change but keeping you posted as to the current direction Original Message From Hayslett Rod Sent Wednesday December PM To Barnes Caroline Hotte Steve Stern Ellis Subject FW Services Agmt et al Importance High Importance High Please review and comment We are looking for concepts and ideas at this point Original Message From Soldano Louis Sent Friday December PM To Hayslett Rod McCarty Danny Porter J Gregory Raker Colleen Howard Kevin A Lowry Phil Smith Gary Blair Lynn January Steve Dietz Rick Fossum Drew Vaughn Ann Schaffer Brian Miller Mary Kay Neubauer Dave Sandt Jim Rice Greek Place Janet Bouillion James L Subject Services Agmt et al Importance High attached please find two agreements a draft of a mutual services agmt and an employment agmt These are drafts to stimulate discussion and comments They need to be cleaned up and tightened and in some cases filled in entirely There may well be significant changes in approach so do not become too caught up in the minor matters Let me and Colleen know your thgts Have a great Christmas

EDS Billing Cc We have surpassed the Enron minimum commitment spend of with EDS We would not have met our commitment without being creative and asking EDS to purchase worth of flat screens for use in Enron Center South In we once again have an take or pay commitment Currently we have approximately worth of EDS utilization commitments from various Enron business units Which means we will need another worth of creative EDS spend in After the Enron spend commitment to EDS is per year with no set contract termination My understanding is that the way in which the original financing deal with EDS was booked deters us from ending our relationship with EDS Please find the details attached

EGS CIO Cc After interviewing the short list of candidates the Managing Directors of ETS met today to narrow the list to the final two They are Everett Plante Brad Holmes Mark you will be contacted by HR to schedule an interview with each of these individuals Stan Horton will also be asked to interview them A final decision can be made at the conclusion of those discussions Expediting this decision will assist me in taking on my new responsibilities If there is any information I can provide you on the responsibilities of the current EGS position or on either of the candidates please let me know Thank you

FW Requested Information Cost for Flat Panels Cc an fyi Happy New Year Original Message From Harrelson Mike Sent Monday December PM To McFarland Jean Cc Hotte Steve Subject Requested Information Cost for Flat Panels Jean As requested here is the breakdown of the costs of purchasing the TFT flat panels from Corp GSS is still working on the cost of the plasma and I will get to you as soon as possible First Request for Gas Logistics flat panels unit flat panels unit Total nd Request Mary Kay Miller flat panels unit flat panels unit Total rd Request Verbal for Dan McCarty flat panels unit As we have discussed we still do not have approval from the Bankruptcy court to officially sell them to you but we can loan them to you and once approval is gained we can square away the cost Please call me at X if you have any questions Have a great New Year Regards Mike

Draft Press Release for TW Open Season on EOLfind attached the press release for Transwesterns Capacity Bidding the letter to be sent to each of Transwesterns customers and a table of key dates The documents have been reviewed by GPG personnel with Amber White a member of Dave Schafers team coordinating the press release To date everone feels comfortable with the time table If that is no longer the case please let me know before our meeting with the FERC Also please let me know if there are any comments or questions regarding the content of the press release or customer letter Thank you Key Dates Wednesday May Meet with FERC Thursday June Press Release Thursday June Note sent to customers Thursday June Capacity Bidding opens Monday June Capacity Bidding closes

RE EDS Hosting Contract Cc legal Whatever is easiest for you My thought would be the suggestion of a side letter of agreement would take less effort to complete than a modification to the MSA Original Message From Greenberg Mark Sent Thursday August AM To Hotte Steve Cc Holsworth Mark Taylor Mark E Legal Zamer Will Subject EDS Hosting Contract Steve Will Zamer relayed to me the information about the EDSEnron relationship and the proposed paragraph you would like to see included in the EDS Hosting Contract I work with Mark Taylors group in the EWS Legal Dept and have been supporting the Net WorksCommodityLogic project of which Will is a part since I began at Enron in July As you may be aware CommodityLogic is a Net Works sub that has developed an internet based product to electronically supports the mid and back offices of trading companies enabling the individuals within these companies to finalize back office aspects of trades eg confirmations nominations and invoicing The concept is to have a system that is not only one to many eg Enron to its counterparties but to also have a system that is many to many and not necessarily Enron reliant The biggest stumbling block to the many to many concept is the neutrality of the server system that will hold all of the trade data so that it can be reconciled by the parties to the trade CommodityLogic calls it the CommodityHub Accordingly CommodityLogic wants to pursue the EDS hosting agreement to bolster the neutrality of the hub and assist in marketing efforts I have been keeping Mark Holsworth in the loop and he has indicated an indifference as to whether we have CommodityLogic LLC or Enron Corp sign the document He has however echoed your concern about ensuring that the hosting costs go against Enrons overall annual obligation to EDS So that we can accomplish both goals neutrality and cost allocation would it be acceptable if we pursued either a a side letter with EDS to reflect that this contract would count against the Enron minimum EDS commitment or b a short amendment to the existing agreement that would accomplish the same thing the amendment merely indicating that web hosting services provided to Enron or any subsidiary or affiliated entity would be included in the annual EDS IS Budget for Enron I welcome your thoughts on this matter Thanks Mark
